parameter.name: activeList
parameter.description: Options for returning the list of items the user is actively selling.

parameter.name: bidList
parameter.description: Options for returning the list of items on which there are bids.

parameter.name: deletedFromSoldList
parameter.description: Options for returning the list of items the user sold and then deleted from their eBay page.

parameter.name: deletedFromUnsoldList
parameter.description: Options for returning the user either ended or did not sell and then deleted from their eBay page.

parameter.name: hideVariations
parameter.description: Whether to hid the Variations node from the result.

parameter.name: scheduledList
parameter.description: Options for returning the list of items the user has scheduled to sell but whose listings have not yet opened.

parameter.name: sellingSummary
parameter.description: Options for returning the summary of a user's buying activity.

parameter.name: soldList
parameter.description: Options for returning the list of items the user has sold.

parameter.name: unsoldList
parameter.description: Options for returning the list of items the user has listed, but whose listings have ended without being sold.

parameter.name: detailLevel
parameter.description: The level of detail to return.

parameter.name: outputSelector
parameter.description: The selector to restrict data returned by the call.
